## Moscow is a historically young city

At the time of [Kyivan Rus (880 - 1240)](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kievan_Rus%27), [Moscow (1147)](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Moscow) was nothing but forest.
